author: bencomic

left.text: You'll have some explaining to do when the internet goes out... my estimated time is about 15 minutes. I'm good at this, John. Never lie to an IRCOP again.

right.text: what will he do>? is he for real? will he really tell them I'm bi
he's ruined a lot of people's lives

left.text: Yeah.. we've had runins with him before. basically he calls the internet service provider (ISP) and they disconnect all internet service.

title: THE BALLAD OF JOHN JR: Part 47
